post.description:
Creates Multibanco payment references:
- with or without payment deadline
- define an amount or an interval with max/min amounts to receive the payment
- may choose if the references allow only 1 or more that 1 payment

data_inicio.description: Reference starts to allow payments on this day (YYYY-MM-DD)

valor_maximo.description: Maximum amount (only for references that allow payments in an interval of amounts)

valor_minimo.description: Minimum amount (only for references that allow payments in an interval of amounts)

per_dup.description: Defines if the reference allows 1 payment or more that 1 payment (1 = allows multiple payments | 0 = allows only 1 payment)

campos_extra.description: Use this object to assign extra fields. Note that extra fields must be first setted up on your account channel.

valor.description: Value that should be assigned to this extra field for this reference.

failOver.description: Send a reminder to your customer that their payment has expired (Only available on references with deadline).

email.description: User email to receive the reminder notification (Only if failover = 1).

contacto.description: User phone number to receive the reminder notification (Only if failover = 1).

userID.description: User identifier parameter. (Mandatory for some clients)

resposta.example: Os dados inseridos não são válidos

alias.description: Phone number that is connected to the MB WAY app and will pay

descricao.description: Optional text that may appear on the payment request (e.g.: store name)

failOver.description: Send a reminder to your customer that their payment has expired.

email.description: User email to receive the reminder notification (Only if failover = 1).

contacto.description: User phone number to receive the reminder notification (Only if failover = 1).

Invalid Data.value:
{
    "sucesso": false,
    "estado": -9,
    "resposta": "Impossível gerar referência com os valores fornecidos.",
    "alias": "351#911111111",
    "valor": null,
    "referencia": "0"
}

resposta.example: Impossível gerar referência com os valores fornecidos.

post.description:
Creates Payshop payment references.

These references are paid in cash on a large Portuguese network.

resposta.example: Os dados inseridos não são válidos
Impossível gerar referência com os valores fornecidos.

url_retorno.description: Used to define the url to where the customer will be redirected he/she finishes the payment.

post.description: Creates a url to a secure form where the customer may finish the Credit Card payment. Uses 3D Secure Technology.

tds.description: Mandatory to define this parameter as 1 (it forces the use of 3D Secure Technology)

url_logotipo.description: Use to define a custom imagem to show your payment request.

url_retorno.description: Used to define the url to where the customer will be redirected he/she finishes the payment.

comentario.description: Optional text that will appear between the logo and the payment amount

post.description: Check the status of a reference on Eupago.

entidade.description: Entity (If it exists, Not all services have an entity)

post.description: Creates MB WAY Meal Passes payment requests.

alias.description: Phone number that is connected to the MB WAY app and will pay

post.description: Creates Multibanco payment references with a deadline, using check-digit. These references will only accept a single payment in a specific amount until they exceed their deadline.

data_inicio.description: Reference starts to allow payments on this day (YYYY-MM-DD)

resposta.example: Os dados inseridos não são válidos
Formato de data inválido. A data de início deve estar no formato YYYY-MM-DD!

alias.description: Phone number that is connected to the MB WAY app and will pay

descricao.description: Optional text that may appear on the payment request (e.g.: store name)

failOver.description: Send a reminder to your customer that their payment has expired.

email.description: User email to receive the reminder notification (Only if failover = 1).

contacto.description: User phone number to receive the reminder notification (Only if failover = 1).
